game.name: Restless Rites
game.shortDescription: Tend to a cursed chapel at the edge of town, or be swallowed by what sleeps beneath it. Clean, survive, and unravel a rotting mystery in this surreal horror game of routine, decay, and sacrifice.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tend to a cursed chapel at the edge of town, or be swallowed by what sleeps beneath it. Clean, survive, and unravel a rotting mystery in this surreal horror game of routine, decay, and sacrifice.
